SyncManager.summary: The SyncManager interface of the {{domxref("Background Synchronization API", "", "", "nocode")}} provides an interface for registering and listing sync registrations.

SyncManagerRegister.summary: The register() method of the interface registers a synchronization event, triggering a event inside the associated service worker as soon as network connectivity is available.

SyncManagerGetTags.summary:
The getTags() method of the
interface returns a list of developer-defined identifiers for
SyncManager registrations.
SyncManagerGetTags.returns:
A that resolves to an array of strings
containing developer-defined identifiers for SyncManager registrations.
